recipes.label: Another Shift at the Hospital
recipes.startdescription: Another shift: mopping the darkened hallways, delivering post to hollow-eyed invalids, trundling corpse-laden gurneys to the basement.
recipes.description: Halfway through your shift, the head porter beckons you aside. 'We won't require your services any longer', he says. 'Here: your last payment. We've paid you through the end of the month.' I have lost my job. At least now I have a little time to rest, and my Health improves. [Dream is unlocked.]

recipes.label: Recall my Dreams
recipes.startdescription: Once again, I dream of a glow beneath the filthy skin of the world. The light through the black wood. The pale door. The old man -
recipes.description:
It began when I spoke to the old man in the hospital. He knew my name. But he's dead now. The pneumonia. Why do I dream of him still? What is the cobalt light in my dreams?
[Time is now passing.]
recipes.comments: This is triggered from the intro work recipe only.

recipes.label: A Change in the Air
recipes.startdescription: I need Funds to live. But perhaps this recent upset in my circumstances is a secret blessing. Is there something to my dreams? There is a change in the air.

recipes.label: A Bequest Arrives
recipes.startdescription: A letter from a solicitor. The old man at the hospital - the one I dream of - has named me in his will. I'll hear more soon.
recipes.description: The old man has bequeathed me a sum of money, and a packet of peculiar papers - poetry, riddles, metaphysical speculations. For the first time in months, here is some fuel for my Reason. [Study is unlocked.]
recipes.comments: This makes the Study action available, and is triggered from intro only.

recipes.label: Examine the Bequest, employing Reason
recipes.startdescription: I'll examine each item with meticulous care.
recipes.description: My correspondent describes my dreams exactly! They use names that are instantly familiar - the House, the Wood, the Hours, the Glory. They knew secrets beneath time and the skin of the world. A new curiosity burns in me. There is a note here - directions to a book shop that does not advertise its wares -

recipes.label: Examine my Bequest, employing Passion
recipes.startdescription: I'll read, theorise, pace, sketch, clutch at my hair in wonder, rise in elation, collapse in despair.
recipes.description: My correspondent describes my dreams exactly! They use names that are instantly familiar - the House, the Wood, the Hours, the Glory. I sense here a power that generals and kings would envy. A new desire burns in me. There is a note here - directions to a book shop that does not advertise its wares -

recipes.label: Find a potential collaborator
recipes.startdescription: I have a name, a description, a few tantalising details... but there are a thousand thousand faces in this city.
recipes.description: And now I have an address! I'll dispatch a letter and propose a meeting. [ Talk is unlocked].
recipes.comments: This is one way the Talk verb may be opened.
